scripts.format: shopt -s extglob globstar && prettier --config ./.prettierrc.json -c --write ./src/**/*.ts* && shopt -u extglob globstar
scripts.start: { [ "$PORT" ] || PORT=1234; } && { [ "$API" ] || { echo 'API not defined!' && exit 1; }; } && echo "PORT: $PORT, API: $API" && npm run build && http-server -p "$PORT" -- ./dist/build
scripts.start:dev: { [ "$PORT" ] || PORT=1234; } && { [ "$API" ] || { echo 'API not defined!' && exit 1; }; } && echo "PORT: $PORT, API: $API" && parcel serve --no-cache -d ./dist/ -p "$PORT" -- "$npm_package_main"
